history.p: Finishing the 29 smaa Præludier for Orgel eller Harmonium (CNW 96), Nielsen began working on what was to be his last major composition: the organ work Commotio. It is not quite clear precisely when Nielsen began on the composition; some of the drafts are possibly from June 1930. The work was completed in February 1931.

annot.p: The text was originally intended as part of a concert programme for Emilius Bangert's performance of Commotio at St. Marien in Lübeck for the Nordic-German organ-week, October 1931.
